features: [360° Rotating & Floral Design ] This cutlery caddy holder can rotate 360 degrees and can be easily picked up with just a slight rotation, making it very convenient! The sides with beautiful floral designs, and the bottom is designed with hollows to keep the countertop clean and ventilated.

[Neat and Organized & 4 Compartment] Are you still worried about the messy knives and forks on the dining table? This utensil caddy holder organizer can meet your needs, including 4 compartments where kitchen utensils such as knives, forks, spoons, scissors, etc. can be placed, making the dining table tidy and orderly again.

[Thickened & Durable] This silverware caddy countertop organizer made of premium quality metal. Thickened material for more stable storage. Wear-resistant, abrasion-resistant coating can ensure the durability and long lasting usage.

[multifunctional] This countertop organizer can be used not only as a utensil holder, but also as a pen holder, makeup brush holder, and so on. As a flatware utensil caddy organizer to store knives, forks, spoons, etc; As a pencil holder for storing office supplies, such as pencils, colored pens, crayons, rulers, etc; As a makeup brush holder organizer for storing eyebrow brushes, beauty knives, makeup brushes, etc.

[Great Gift & 100% Service Team] Just gently screw in the handle to use, it can be completed in 1 minute! Such a multifunctional rotating flatware caddy is certainly the best choice for giving away to friends! We provide a fully rated service team. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will provide you with a satisfactory response within 24 hours

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YIUKEA Kitchen Silverware Caddy Organizer Countertop Are you still worried about the messy knives and forks on the dining table? Put this silverware caddy countertop on your dining table and you can easily obtain various knives and forks! And it has 4 compartments that can be divided to place knives, forks, and spoons, making your countertop cleaner!
More Details Previous page Next page

Suitable for Indoor & Outdoor Whether for indoor gatherings or outdoor camping, this kitchen untensil caddy is a great helper for storing knives and forks. It can not only rotate 360 degrees, but also comes with a handle, making it more convenient and practical!
Multifunctional Little Caddy Can be used as a pen holder on your desk to hold pens, scissors, staplers, etc
It can serve as a desktop organzier on your desk to place colored pens, crayons, etc.
Our cutlery caddy is the great choice for various occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked everything. It's nice and small so I now have more room on my counter. What's not to like? It rotates just like it says. It holds item like cutlery, pens, desk items and I'll keep thinking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my Daughter’s upcoming wedding. I plan on putting forks in it for the cake table. It looks very nice. I was concerned it might be cheap looking but it’s not at all and it is very sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice look but the sides need to be an inch or so taller to hold things better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The depth of item is shallow
reviews.reviewText: The depth of the item is pretty shallow and fits disposable utensils well, but not metal utensils that are much taller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking, easy movement utensil caddy
reviews.reviewText: Last get-together, we had to use mugs to hold our silverware when we ran out of room on the buffet. It worked, but we were serving on gold-edged Christmas china and using a Santa Claus mug to hold the forks wasn’t the special look we wanted.We’ll be better prepared for our next dinner with this metal silverware caddy. We trade off our tableware depending on what plates we’re using so I got this in black. It goes well with our goldware, silverware, rose-gold set, black and silver set, and turquoise enamelware. Disposable eating utensils fit in the compartments, too.It came assembled with only the center ring to hold it, needing to be screwed in place. The base stays in place and the section holding the four compartments spin. The individual compartments are three-inches deep and larger dinnerware can fit and not fall out when the caddy is spinning. It worked fine whether all four compartments were filled or just one.The scrollwork design is detailed, with no unfinished edges and the price point is comparable to the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and elegant
reviews.reviewText: The YIUKEA 360° Rotating Utensil Caddy will liven up your table for a casual repast with friends and family. The studily constructed rotating basket is a trelliage filigree in black or silver that is remniscent of New Orleans French Quarter cast iron. (See photos.) The convenient caddy allows you to instantly set the table for an estimated number of guests with whom you can now spend more time. It's also a space saver, eliminating the effort of having to lay out individual pieces of cutlery. You can't go wrong with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for Utensils; Height Not as Stated
reviews.reviewText: This caddy is very pretty but it is not for utensils. It's too short for that use. Each compartment is only 3 1/4" in height; not the 6.7" as claimed. The average knife is 9" in length. Do the math. I wanted this specifically for utensils, so I am very disappointed.I started putting in my knives on one side and they were too long and the whole thing tipped over. Now, you could load each quadrant, like three spoons, then three forks, etc. In theory, that may stop the tipping but what happens when you remove an unequal number of silverware? It won't work. I think it may work with plastic utensils.It does move well, so it would work with cosmetics, office supplies or even individually packaged condiments. Just don't use it with normal sized metal utensils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and Intricate Detail with Smooth Action
reviews.reviewText: We use a lot of plasticware and this is an attractive way to keep those utensils within easy reach. I really like the silver AND the black, but the black looks best with my home decor. The only assembly is to screw in the loop handle in the middle. This carousel moves very smoothly and the details are very fine; it looks quite nice on the counter. Would work for formal or casual table as well.
